DOC.brief_summary: This trial is set to detect the impact of bilateral internal iliac artery ligation on the amount of intra-operative blood loss during the hysterectomy procedure done for the management of placenta percreta
DOC.brief_title: Internal Iliac Artery Ligation and Placenta Percreta
DOC.criteria: females with preoperative diagnosis of placenta percreta refusal to get enrolled in the study
